name: ObjectIDDisplay
description: Show an object's ID in the level editor in its lower right corner.

extraSafety.name: Extra Safety Mode
extraSafety.description:
Performs (optional) additional checks to ensure that there is a valid GameObject before creating the object ID.

<cy>Turning this off may shave off a few seconds or have no impact on level editor load times, depending on your device.</c>

readableMode.name: Readable Displays (Stronger Blending)
readableMode.description:
Make the info label easier to read across a far larger variety of scenarios.

<cy>Recommended for the</c> <cl>chatFont</c> <cy>font only.</c>

<cy>For best results, make sure the opacity setting</c> <cl>(seen in "Stack Size Color + Opacity")</c> <cy>is set to</c> <cl>1.00</c><cy>!</c>

stackSizeFont.name: Object ID Display Font
stackSizeFont.description:
Choose the font for the stack size text.

<cj>0 for Pusab, -1 for Golden Pusab, and -2 for the font you see when viewing level comments</c> <cl>(chatFont)</c> <cj>.</c>
<cy>To use font numbers greater than 0: refer to the level editor for the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, and then put it here.</c>

scale.name: Object ID Display Scale
scale.description: Adjust the scale of the stack size text.

padding.name: Object ID Display Positioning Padding
padding.description: Adjust the amount of padding for positioning the stack size text.

color.name: Object ID Display Color + Opacity
color.description:
Adjust the color/opacity of the stack size text.

<cy>Recommended for the</c> <cl>chatFont</c> <cy>font only.</c>
